sub_title: Director Launch Excellence (International Region, Canada Europe Australia Japan) at Alnylam Pharmaceuticals
summary:
To acquire a position in an organization that will allow me to apply my skills and provide the opportunity to contribute to the overall goals. I am a hard working, and active individual who works well as part of a team or by myself with creativity and initiative.

Specialties: International Business skills knowledge, multilingual capabilities (Italian, English, basic Spanish and Swedish), international living and working experiences, mainly in Europe (The Netherlands, Ukraine, Sweden, Ireland). Basic knowledge of HTML, Dreamweaver, ArcGIS software for spatial analysis, TrackWise, SAP.
